author: Tuicemen
title: RPI Tools
description: A group of tools to help RPI users

widgets.name: Status info
widgets.description: Widget for controlling pre-set capable cameras

programs.name: Status info
programs.description: displays info of CPU temperature,time now, time running,CPU temperature, disk and memory info

programs.name: RPi Drive Cleaner
programs.description: frees up space used but not release from updates and upgrades

programs.name: RPi Reboot
programs.description: Reboots RPI from inside HG option to set delay available

programs.name: RPi Update
programs.description: Updates RPI packages from inside HG

programs.name: DateTime Reset
programs.description: gets correct time and sets it if RPI date or time is off

programs.name: Safe Shutdown
programs.description: Safely shuts down RPI from inside HG ,Option to set delay available
